meaning: (n) địa chỉ, diễn văn, sự khôn khéo, (v) trình bày
tránh, tránh khỏi; hủy bỏ, bác bỏ
example: I try to avoid supermarkets on Saturdays - they're always so busy.

meaning: bày tỏ, biểu lộ, cho thấy; chứng minh, giải thích
example: These numbers clearly demonstrate the size of the economic problem facing the country.

meaning: phát triển, tiến triển, triển khai, mở rộng
example: It became clear that he wasn't developing like all the other little boys.

meaning: đánh giá, định giá; ước lượng
example: It's impossible to evaluate these results without knowing more about the research methods employed.

meaning: tập hợp, tụ thập, thu thập; kết luận, suy ra
example: I went to several libraries to gather information about the plans.

meaning: (n) đề xuất, đề nghị, (v) đề nghị
example: [ + two objects ] I feel bad that I didn't offer them any food/offer any food to them.

meaning: trước hết, đầu tiên; chính, chủ yếu, quan trọng nhất
example: We're primarily concerned with keeping expenditure down.

meaning: sự nguy hiểm, sự rủi ro
example: In this business, the risks and the rewards are high.

meaning: chiến lược, sự vạch kế hoạch hành động
example: The president held an emergency meeting to discuss military strategy with the Pentagon yesterday.

meaning: khỏe, mạnh, tốt, bền, kiên cố; đanh thép, kiên quyết; sôi nổi, nhiệt tình...
example: She must be very strong to carry such a weight on her back.
It looks as though the coach is going to make a substitution (= change one player for another in the game).
